channel.title: Coordinates
channel.description: I need to know the coordinates of where I'm standing at all times, makes it much easier to update. Any way to do this?

item.title: Coordinates
item.dc:creator: @_Articuno `Articuno
item.description:
@_Articuno wrote:

The only issue with that is the fact that I have to type that every time I need to know. I know previously I have seen this where typically the weight of carried items would be. I’m looking for something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Coordinates
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

`Articuno:

I need to know the coordinates of where I’m standing at all times, makes it much easier to update. Any way to do this?

:o try this out :

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Of yours you can change to 0 to 1 (mod) , 2 (admin) , 3 (owner) , 4 hidden Admin)

I think you should do it to > 2.

Read full topic
